name: dead-trend-tracker
description: Web3 short-form video platform resurrecting dead social media platforms

scripts.setup: node validate.js && npm run install:all && cd backend && npx hardhat compile
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:contracts
scripts.deploy:contracts: cd backend && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network mumbai
